entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Crowsnest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:18 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Crowsnest 03:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this evening. Flurries or wet flurries late this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
